og.title: 2026 Taipei Floral Picnic
og.description: This March, experience the magic of spring at the 2026 Taipei Floral Picnic in Daan Park! Explore three unique themed picnic areas and a global specialty market all in one place.

about.html:
This March, experience the magic of spring at the 2026 Taipei Floral Picnic in Daan Park! Explore three unique themed picnic areas and a global specialty market all in one place.

Get ready for high-energy 'Coffee Raves,' soul-soothing 'Green Healing Fitness,' and whimsical 'Creative Dress-up Shows' for families and furry friends, plus spectacular live performances throughout the weekend.

In an exclusive partnership with Pokémon GO, the event also features meet-and-greets with Pikachu and Eevee, a Pokémon Pokopia trial area, and a variety of interactive on-site activities.

Register now to receive a limited-edition event-exclusive picnic mat (available while supplies last).

We warmly invite you to join us with your loved ones for this grand springtime feast—a romantic, trendy celebration of the senses enveloped in the fragrance of flowers.
